articles.title: Bitcoin price could climb towards $48,000 target with upcoming US SEC approval on BTC Spot ETF - FXStreet
articles.description: Bitcoin price sustained above $44,200 on Friday. The largest asset by market capitalization held on to its gains from the week as the market ushers in the report of likely Spot Bitcoin ETF approval by the SEC.
